price: ya Tuhan kami dan masukkanlah mereka ke dalam surga ʻAdn yang telah Engkau janjikan kepada mereka dan orang-orang yang saleh di antara bapak-bapak mereka dan istri-istri mereka dan keturunan mereka semua.  Sesungguhnya Engkaulah Yang Maha Perkasa lagi Maha Bijaksana,
arabic: رَبَّنَا وَأَدۡخِلۡهُمۡ جَنَّٰتِ عَدۡنٍ ٱلَّتِي وَعَدتَّهُمۡ وَمَن صَلَحَ مِنۡ ءَابَآئِهِمۡ وَأَزۡوَٰجِهِمۡ وَذُرِّيَّٰتِهِمۡۚ إِنَّكَ أَنتَ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: rabbanā wa-adkhil'hum jannāti ʿadnin allatī waʿadttahum waman ṣalaḥa min ābāihim wa-azwājihim wadhurriyyātihim innaka anta al-ʿazīzu al-ḥakīmu
